games.title: Pyrrhic
games.shortDescription: Shooter FPS with advanced movement tech and strong focus on player feel
games.role: Gameplay Programmer + Systems Designer + UI Programmer
games.technicalDescription: In development, developed a custom character controller with advanced movement mechanics including wall-running, sliding, and double-jumping. Implemented a modular weapon system using Scriptable Objects for easy expansion. Designed and coded the UI for health, ammo, and crosshair feedback. Optimized serialization for saving player progress and settings.

games.title: Metaspeed
games.shortDescription: A game about a mage that always tries to be faster than the speed of light
games.technicalDescription: In development, implemented core movement mechanics such as walking and sliding and all the spells have the use to give the player the ability to increase their speed and perform advanced maneuvers. The game features a unique blend of physics-based gameplay and fast-paced action, requiring players to master both movement and spellcasting to succeed.
